subject: RTSC Show Tonight at 6pm est. on Paranormal Tv Network
author: Urkel23
full_text:
Tonights special guest is Sal Nicosia, owner the reportedly haunted Shanley
Hotel in New York. Stories of the eyewitness reports should be fascinating to
listen to, hope you can join in.

Here's how to watch the show:

http://www.paranormaltvnetwork.com/channel2.html

Shows on from 6-7pm est and will have an interactive chat.

-Steve H.
